title: The Real Reason They’re Freaking Out Over Elon (Ep 1867)
description:
In this episode, I address the growing freak out over Elon and twitter. Also, I discuss the disastrous Biden press conference, where he promoted his latest set of fairytales. I address the new economic data indicating tough times are coming. Finally, I discuss the growing fight against Blackrock’s economic tyranny. 

News Picks:

Under Joe Biden, Americans see 'most severe' pay cut in 25 years due to inflation.

$4,408,452,000,000: Federal Tax Collections Set Record Through August.


OPEC humiliates Biden again.

It’s only a matter of time before the libs mischaracterize this crime study.


Amnesty via DACA struck down by court. 


Louisiana sticks it to Blackrock.
